WorkItem.ClosedComment: I found out that if you Ctrl+Click the Optimize button, it runs it at 10x the thoroughness setting. I know it's not documented, but I'm adding that now.
WorkItem.Description:
My PC at home is pretty good and it finishes an optimise within about 20 secs or less.   Normally this of course would be fantastic, but I am finding at the moment that if I run the optimiser 3-4 times, i'll get different combinations of reforges that give slightly higher or lower scores.   The differences are small (like swapping reforges to get exactly on the hit cap instead of one over the cap) and are all in about +/- 1 dps so it isn't a major thing.   It does bother me a little when the optimiser recommends a downgrade to my gear.
 
I am optimising with the condition to not have my interrupts miss.
 
If the optimiser had increased thoroughness, it might be able to successfully examine all the different reforging combinations and consistantly come up with the best solution.
 
The attached caharacter file has been optimised once - and got an overall score of 20037.95.
Successive optimises got :-   (1) 20040.44   (2) 20042.1  (3) 20042.1 (different reforges though)  (4) 20041.27

Comments.Message: Looks like you forgot to attach your character. I'd like to do some tests on it to see whether a larger thoroughness or just repeated runs is more likely to achieve optimum.

Sorry - it's added now.    That post and the repeated optimises (which take about 2mins on this crap work PC) actually took me about 6 hours to do yesterday because I kept getting distracted by real work :)

Wow!   That could be a mistake in some models :)

But perfect for my needs - thanks.
